import React from 'react' import Signup from "./Signup" import Signin from "./Signin" import { Link, useHistory } from "react-router-dom" export default function Home() { const [showResults, setShowResults] = React.useState(false) const onClick = () => setShowResults(true) return (
{!showResults ? : null}
Need an account? Sign Up
{showResults ? : null}
Already have an account? Log In
) }
